comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: a portrait of Admiral David Beatty.  Quite popular and with distinct flare, he was also impetuous and over-eager.He made some critical mistakes at the battle of Jutland that may have kept the British from routing the Germans.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.wikigallery.org/wiki/painting_201592/Philip-Alexius-D... seems to show the original painting (and offers to supply a copy). www.bridgemanart.com/image.aspx?img=1583e991-9adf-4162-a6... suggests 1911 as the date for the painting. But there were clearly prints made too. See www.npg.org.uk/collections/search/portraitLarge/mw122881/... I think the Bain photo may have been of a print rather than the oil painting.
